doc:
Peter Chelsom https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Chelsom 0 Peter Chelsom (born 20 April 1956) is a British film director, writer, and actor. He has directed such films as Hector and the Search for Happiness, Serendipity, and Shall We Dance? Peter Chelsom is a member of the British Academy, the American Academy, The Directors Guild of America, and The Writers Guild of America. Peter_Chelsom ( born 20_April_1956 ) is a_British_film_director , writer , and actor . He has_directed such_films as Hector and the Search for Happiness , Serendipity , and Shall We Dance ?
